animeTitle: Super Real Mahjong: Mahjong Battle Scramble - Konran-teki Sento Mahjong
animeDescription: Sequel of Super Real Mahjong.  Mahjong-playing sisters Kasumi, Miki, and Shouko are sent to a world where mahjong tiles are currency. In order to return to their world, they must defeat a mahjong-playing rabbit who rules the land.
animeRelated: ['Super Real Mahjong: Kasumi Miki Shouko no Hajimemashite']
